documentation.text:
一个抽象的用来管理worker和requester节点的平台，在进行众包任务时
worker和requester首先需要在platform上面进行注册来获取相应的token.
每个节点都需要向节点注册来获取相应的token

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "Only requester can call this to workers who participants its task and has not been rewarded."

arguments.value: Only requester can call this to workers who participants its task and has not been rewarded.

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "Only requester can call this to workers who participants its task and has not been rewarded."

typeDescriptions.typeString: literal_string "The worker alreadly finished its tasks"

arguments.value: The worker alreadly finished its tasks

argumentTypes.typeString: literal_string "The worker alreadly finished its tasks"

documentation.text:
进行任务奖励
按照我们设计的协议，任务应该是由Workers直接提交到Requesters的，
但是目前在这里作为测试用例，在智能合约上面实现该操作

documentation.text:
进行任务奖励
按照我们设计的协议，任务应该是由Workers直接提交到Requesters的，
但是目前在这里作为测试用例，在智能合约上面实现该操作

Rewarding(address,uint256,uint256,addres.notice: 进行任务奖励 按照我们设计的协议，任务应该是由Workers直接提交到Requesters的， 但是目前在这里作为测试用例，在智能合约上面实现该操作

registerWorker(address,uint256).notice: 每个节点都需要向节点注册来获取相应的token
